Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Nirogacestat hydrobromide is approved to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Desmoid tumors that have gotten worse. It is used in adults who need systemic therapy.

Section.Para: Nirogacestat hydrobromide is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
